headline: Carbon3.ai launches the UK's first truly sovereign AI platform - giving customers a lower carbon footprint per compute than any competitor
summary: Carbon3.ai, the UK AI solutions platform, today announced its plans to deliver the UK's first sustainable sovereign AI platform later this year, a vertically integrated ecosystem spanning renewable energy generation, a nationwide mesh of data centres, and an enterprise AI software stack. Backed by significant initial UK capital and a planned £1bn growth programme, and underpinned by the experience, expertise and leading solutions of technology partners HPE, VAST Data and WWT, Carbon3.ai is posit

headline: 1 Large-Cap Stock on Our Buy List and 2 We Brush Off
summary: Large-cap stocks usually command their industries because they have the scale to drive market trends. The flip side though is that their sheer size can limit growth as expanding further becomes an increasingly challenging task.
